comment: As long as you take notes then you will be fine for his exams and quizzes. He will answer any questions and clarify further when asked. Thermo was kinda hard but with further examples and explanations, it wasn't that bad.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: The most disorganized online professor I've taken. Emailed him about links having "admin only" directory and he did not fix the links. Homework assignments say one thing, but he emailed 1 student the separate instructions. Quizzes are on sundays and you have 1.5 hours to take them, which just throws away the flexibility of taking an online class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: I heard this teacher was good, but not anymore. If you ask him a question or for help, he repeats himself louder. It is very frustrating and unproductive. I felt like the whole class was unwilling to ask questions a few weeks in. He does not really help his students, just repeats his vague instructions. If you want to learn do NOT take his class.

Not a good professor. First off, he says he will update d2L with lecture notes, but 4 weeks into class d2L is still empty. Miss 1 day of class and youre extremely behind with no ways to catch up. There is no detailed schedule, so you never know when theres a quiz. If you work best when working at your own pace, he isnt for you.

Take if available no matter the course. first off MATLAB will suck no matter who you take it with just guna keep it real with you. I Took his classs for both Thermodynamics and MATLAB . 10/10 would recommend. The biggest advise I could give is ASK QUESTIONS and BE ENGAGED. He WILL take the time to make sure you understand.
Enjoyed the class. Project was a little challenging but manageable.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lecture heavy
Gives good feedback--Respected--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Prof Khazaii is a very lenient grader. The material on his exams were typically very difficult but if you put enough information, such as a key formula, to to look like you have an idea of what you're doing then you will be fine.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Khazaii made statics very easy. 3 tests, 3 quizzes. HW problems are much tougher than the test & quiz problems. When he is lecturing he is very straightforward and clear, he really is able to dumb things down & teach the main concepts. Does not move on until everyone in the class understands. I would definitely take him again. He is very fair.
